data.meta_description: The higher education system of Latakia is represented by 1 university, which offer 30 study programs. In addition 10 Bachelor programs at 1 university, 10 Master programs at 1 university, and 10 PhD programs at 1 university.
data.text:
Latakia – About the city

The population of the city is 340,181. Latakia is number 7 in Syria by the number of universities available on Free-Apply.com. There are 1 university offering 30 study programs in Latakia.

Syria, Latakia – Higher education system

The higher education system of Latakia is represented by 1 university, which offer 30 study programs. In addition 10 Bachelor programs at 1 university, 10 Master programs at 1 university, and 10 PhD programs at 1 university.
